mapper.select: select * from (select rownum no, b.*, ( select user_nm from mst_user_info_tb u where b.user_id=u.user_id ) name from (select * from mst_board_tb where board_gp = 2 order by board_no) b order by no desc) ORDER BY no DESC

mapper.insert: insert into mst_board_tb( board_gp, root, user_id, board_title, board_content, user_type, filename, filepath ) values( 2, MST_BOARD_TB_SEQ.currval, #{user_id}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 'nomal', #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
